attributes.action: Make domestic service tax deductible to increase employment
attributes.additional_details:
If domestic service [cleaners gardeners etc] wages were tax deductible employment would be greatly increased in an area where flexibility would be most.
The gain to the elderly and disabled would be huge but it would benefit everyone who wanted the employ at home.
The old class view that domestic service is demeaning is utterly outdated and we need to get our economy moving with a greater tax take and a more uplifting experience of life
